page.title: 16LAW & ORDER.CALCOT,READING
page.content: Whilst some areas of Reading do have problems with 'law and order', fortunately,Calcot is not one of them. The local officer in the Calcot area would put the crime rate at about 2%.Major crime is rare.Most crime takes the form of theft,and minor damage.Vandalism is not a major problem.However,there are more causes for concern in the greater Tilehurst area. Local policemen have begun a new campaign to go into schools far more. The aim behind this plan is for there to be more interaction between police officers and young people.Police officers also bring in films dealing with a whole range of issues,both relevant to crime and to young peoples safety. The Police have also reintroduced 'beat policeman',which is well liked.
